description: Now that Leo "TheForce" Forte has made it into the finals once again to defend his belt, who will challenge him? Only two remain, Eli "The Hammer" Hunter and Doug "The Destroyer" Acre. Hammer has fought opponents of all shapes and sizes and has yet to be taken down in this tournament, and he's not going to let this match stand any different. Destroyer has been waiting all year for this opportunity. After losing his chance for the gold belt last year, his eyes are fixated on the championship. The stakes are already high, and the fact that this bout is a rematch between The Destroyer and The Hammer takes this fight to a whole other level. Find out who comes out on top, securing their spot in the final match while the loser gets fucked into submission.
title: Last Semi Final Match of the Summer Smackdown Tournament!!!
